shader.name: asDisneyMaterial
shader.help: Material based on the Disney BRDF

input.name: roughness
input.help: Surface roughness. Mix between lambert and orenNayar.

input.name: backlighting
input.help: Backlighting, show light though a surface (poor mans translucency).

input.name: reflectionMdf
input.help: Microfacet distribution to use: Beckmann or GGX.

input.name: refractionMdf
input.help: Microfacet distribution to use: Beckmann or GGX.
